ibm-appid-redirect-urls:
ibm_appid_redirect_urls

Create, update, or delete an IBM Cloud AppID Management Services Cloud Directory redirect URLs. For more information, see adding redirect URIs
argument-reference:
Argument reference

Review the argument references that you can specify for your resource.

  • tenant_id - (Required, String) The AppID instance GUID
  • urls - (Required, List of String) A list of redirect URLs
import:
Import

The ibm_appid_redirect_urls resource can be imported by using the AppID tenant ID.

Syntax

bash
$ terraform import ibm_appid_redirect_urls.urls

Example

bash
$ terraform import ibm_appid_redirect_urls.urls 5fa344a8-d361-4bc2-9051-58ca253f4b2b
description:
ibm_appid_redirect_urls

Create, update, or delete an IBM Cloud AppID Management Services Cloud Directory redirect URLs. For more information, see adding redirect URIs
